Package statistics

Class Random

java.lang.Object
statistics.Random
All Implemented Interfaces:
RandomGenerator
public class Random extends Object implements RandomGenerator
Class providing a global random generator by using Singleton Design Pattern.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.random.RandomGenerator

    RandomGenerator.ArbitrarilyJumpableGenerator, RandomGenerator.JumpableGenerator, RandomGenerator.LeapableGenerator, RandomGenerator.SplittableGenerator, RandomGenerator.StreamableGenerator

    • discrete

      public <T> T discrete(Collection<T> collection, Function<T,Double> desirability)
      Chooses randomly one element from collection with probability proportional to its desirability.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of elements
      Parameters:
      collection - collection of elements to choose from.
      desirability - function returning desirability of an element.
      Returns:
      one random element from collection chosen with probability proportional to its desirability.
